column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////This is hands down my #1 go-to spot. Definitely get the seasonal sangria
column4: and bacon wrapped dates.  Sometimes you can hit this place when it's super busy
column5: but if you're okay with a bar seat you can usually slide on in if you keep an eye out.  Haven't found another spot that's nice
column7: and the vibe feels relaxed but you feel like you're treating yourself like this spot.
